price: 30.Nabii Luut yi Rabbow baaxó baysah yan maral yoo qik digaalá keenil oobissaamal iyye.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرۡنِي عَلَى ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi unṣur'nī ʿalā al-qawmi al-muf'sidīna
